turns.content: Create a low carb high protein breakfast meal plan

Low Carb High Protein Breakfast Meal Plan:

1. Egg and Vegetable Scramble: Whisk together 2 eggs, diced vegetables (such as bell peppers, mushrooms, and spinach), and a sprinkle of shredded cheese. Cook in a non-stick pan over medium heat until the eggs are set.
2. Greek Yogurt with Berries and Nuts: Mix together 6 oz of Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup of mixed berries, and 1 tablespoon of chopped nuts (such as almonds or walnuts).
3. Cottage Cheese and Vegetable Omelette: Whisk together 2 eggs and 1/4 cup of cottage cheese. Add diced vegetables (such as bell peppers, mushrooms, and spinach) to the mixture and cook in a non-stick pan over medium heat until the eggs are set.
4. Cream Cheese and Lox Bagel: Spread 2 tablespoons of cream cheese over a toasted low-carb bagel. Top with 2 ounces of smoked salmon (lox) and thinly sliced red onion.
5. Breakfast Meat and Cheese Roll-Ups: Roll 2 slices of deli meat (such as turkey or ham) and 1 slice of cheese around steamed asparagus or spinach.
6. Peanut Butter and Celery Sticks: Spread 2 tablespoons of natural peanut butter over celery sticks, add some chopped nuts or chia seeds on top.

You can always customize the above breakfast meal plan with your own preferences, such as using different types of cheese, meat or vegetables.
Put it in a table and provide me the ingredients list

Low Carb High Protein Breakfast Meal Plan:

| Meal | Ingredients |
| --- | --- |
| Egg and Vegetable Scramble | 2 eggs, diced vegetables (such as bell peppers, mushrooms, and spinach), shredded cheese |
| Greek Yogurt with Berries and Nuts | 6 oz Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1 tablespoon chopped nuts (such as almonds or walnuts) |
| Cottage Cheese and Vegetable Omelette | 2 eggs, 1/4 cup cottage cheese, diced vegetables (such as bell peppers, mushrooms, and spinach) |
| Cream Cheese and Lox Bagel | 2 tablespoons cream cheese, 2 oz smoked salmon (lox), thinly sliced red onion, low-carb bagel |
| Breakfast Meat and Cheese Roll-Ups | 2 slices deli meat (such as turkey or ham), 1 slice cheese, steamed asparagus or spinach |
| Peanut Butter and Celery Sticks | 2 tablespoons natural peanut butter, celery sticks, chopped nuts or chia seeds |

You can use any type of cheese, meat or vegetable that you prefer, and also adjust the amount of ingredients based on your own taste.
Provide me the shopping list for the meal plan above

Low Carb High Protein Breakfast Meal Plan Shopping List:

* Eggs
* Diced vegetables (bell peppers, mushrooms, spinach)
* Shredded cheese
* Greek yogurt
* Mixed berries
* Chopped nuts (almonds or walnuts)
* Cottage cheese
* Deli meat (turkey or ham)
* Cheese
* Steamed asparagus or spinach
* Natural peanut butter
* Celery sticks
* Low-carb bagel (if you prefer)
* Smoked salmon (lox)
* Thinly sliced red onion (optional)
* Chia seeds (optional)

Please note that this list includes all the ingredients for all the breakfast options in the meal plan. You can adjust the list to fit your preferences and dietary requirements.
